Name: A Faire Reward
Text: Instead of a minion, Triple Rewards Discover a Tier 1 Darkmoon Prize (Improves in 4 turns!).

Name: All Bottled Up
Text: At the start of each turn, get a 'Portal in a Bottle'.

Name: Anomalous Bribe
Text: After you sell a minion, give its stats to a minion in the Tavern.

Name: Anomalous Evidence
Text: At the start of your turn, choose from 2 new Quest Rewards.

Name: Anomalous Twin
Text: Start of combat: Summon a copy of your highest-Health minion.

Name: Anomalous Wisdomball
Text: You occasionally get helpful Refreshes! (Unlocks on Turn 6.)

Name: Anti-Gravity Stadium
Text: Minions in the Tavern have their Attack and Health swapped.

Name: Audience's Choice
Text: At the start of each turn, one player chooses a card for ALL players to get at end of turn.

Name: Big League
Text: Only Tavern Tiers 3, 4, 5, and 6 exist. Start with 10 extra Armor.

Name: Blessed or Blighted
Text: Start of Combat: Give your left-most minion Divine Shield and your right-most minion Reborn.

Name: Blood of Sargeras
Text: At the start of your turn, set your hero's Health to 12.

Name: Bring Home the Bacon
Text: Start with two upgrading Piggy Banks. Break them open to gain Gold!

Name: Bring in the Buddies
Text: Buddies are in the Tavern.

Name: Continuing Education
Text: At the start of each turn, get an Evolving Scroll. Each turn, it transforms into a Tavern spell from a higher Tier.

Name: Cosmic Duality
Text: At the start of the game, Discover a second Hero Power.

Name: Curse of Aggramar
Text: Start at 5 Health and 5 Gold. Your hero can only take 1 damage at a time.

Name: Deep Blue Sooner
Text: At the start of your turn, get 2 temporary 'Deep Blues'. They give a minion more stats each time.

Name: Denathrius' Anima Reserves
Text: Quests and Rewards are in this game. All heroes are Sire Denathrius.

Name: Double Header
Text: The first time you buy a minion each turn, get an extra copy of it.

Name: Echoes of Argus
Text: Your Battlecries and Deathrattles trigger an extra time.

Name: Eleventh Hour
Text: The first time your hero takes fatal damage in combat, prevent it and gain 11 Gold next turn.

Name: Elven Elite
Text: The Tavern only offers cards of your Tier.

Name: Emergency Landing
Text: Twice per turn, you can remove all copies of a minion in the Tavern from your pool.

Name: Eonar's Overgrown Arena
Text: At the start of your turn, give minions in the Tavern +1/+1 for the rest of the game.

Name: Everything's on Fire!
Text: At the start of the game, take 25 damage. After another hero dies, regain 5 Health.

Name: Factory Line
Text: At the end of every 2 turns, get a plain copy of your left-most minion.

Name: False Idols
Text: You only need 2 copies of a minion to make it Golden. Instead of a Triple Reward, get a Gold Coin.

Name: Feline Fortune
Text: After another hero dies, Discover a minion from their warband. It keeps enchantments.

Name: Finicky Hourglass
Text: Start at Tavern Tier 2.

Name: Fortitude of Khaz'goroth
Text: At the end of your turn, set your left and right-most minions' Health to the higher of the two.

Name: Gladiator's Spoils
Text: After you win a combat, Discover a minion of your Tier. Otherwise, get a random one of a Tier lower.

Name: Golden Arrow
Text: Every 3 turns, get a 'Golden Arrow'.

Name: Golden Friendship
Text: Once per game, you can Goldenize and Pass a minion.

Name: Golganneth's Tempest
Text: Minions cost 2 Gold. You cannot Refresh the Tavern. It Refreshes itself after you buy a card.

Name: Grapnel of the Titans
Text: The first minion you buy each turn is free.

Name: How to Even??
Text: Only Tavern Tiers 2, 4, and 6 exist. Triple rewards Discover a minion of your Tier.

Name: Incubation Mutation
Text: Minions with no type have all minion types.

Name: Instant Warband
Text: Start with 3 different Tier 1 minions in hand.

Name: Lay of the Land
Text: The Tavern offers 1 extra Tavern spell after each Refresh

Name: Light the Way
Text: After you Refresh two times, gain 1 Gold next turn.

Name: Line in the Sand
Text: Start with Sandy in play.

Name: Little League
Text: Only Tavern Tiers 1, 2, 3, and 4 exist.

Name: Magic Shop
Text: Spell Tickets are in the Tavern! Get 3 to Discover a Tavern spell of your Tier.

Name: Marin's Treasure Box
Text: Trinkets are in this game. All heroes are Marin the Manager.

Name: Match Fixing
Text: Guess which player will win your next combat. If you're correct, get 3 Coins.

Name: Might of Khaz'goroth
Text: At the end of your turn, set your left and right-most minions' Attack to the higher of the two.

Name: Mimiron's Clockwork Stadium
Text: You cannot upgrade the Tavern with Gold. It upgrades itself every 2 turns. (2 turns left!)

Name: Money Match
Text: Start at 10 Gold.

Name: Mystical Blossom
Text: At the start of each turn, Discover a Tavern spell. (Unlocks on Turn 3.)

Name: Nguyen's Shifting Disks
Text: All heroes are Master Nguyen.

Name: No Face, No Case
Text: Every 4 turns, Get a 'Faceless Manipulator'.

Name: No Place Like Holmes
Text: Each turn, look at 2 minions. Guess which one your next opponent had last combat for a Coin.

Name: Oops, All _______!
Text: Only minions of this type and Neutrals are in the Tavern.

Name: Overseer's Orb
Text: After you upgrade the Tavern, Refresh it with minions of your most common type.

Name: Packed Stands
Text: The Tavern always has 7 cards.

Name: Path of the Treasure-Seeker
Text: After you Refresh 5 times, find the Golden Monkey! (5 left!)

Name: Perfected Alchemy
Text: Start with a 'Goldenizer'.

Name: Planar Alignment
Text: At the start of each turn, get a random minion of your most common type. (Unlocks on Turn 2.)

Name: Pooled Resources
Text: You can send your Gold to your teammate.

Name: Prudence of Amitus
Text: Unspent Gold carries over to your next turn. If you saved at least 5, gain 1 extra.

Name: Reckless Enhancement
Text: Minions in the Tavern each randomly gain Taunt, Windfury, Divine Shield, or Reborn.

Name: Rising Current
Text: After you upgrade the Tavern, Discover a Tier 1 spell. (Improves every 2 turns!)

Name: Scout's Honor
Text: Start with a Patient Scout in play.

Name: Secrets of Norgannon
Text: Tavern Tier 7 exists. Start with 10 extra Armor.

Name: Shackles of the Primus
Text: After each combat, remove your warband. At the start of your turn, triple your Gold.

Name: Sin'dorei Mirror
Text: After you buy your first Tavern spell each turn, get an extra copy of it. (Unlocks on Turn 5.)

Name: Summoning of Champions
Text: At the start of the game, all players Discover a Tier 6 minion from the same choices.

Name: Tavern Special
Text: All minions types are in the Tavern. It always has 7 cards.

Name: Temperance of Aman'Thul
Text: Start of Tavern Tier 3 with 9 Gold. All cards in the first shop are Tier 3.

Name: The Golden Arena
Text: ALL minions are Golden, but you do not get Triple Rewards.

Name: The Keys to Victory
Text: After you play a minion, give your other minions +1/+1 for each Keyword they share with it.

Name: The Yogg-iseum
Text: At the start of each turn, spin the SAME Wheel of Yogg-Saron.

Name: Treasure Hoard
Text: On Turn 6, Discover a Golden Tier 4 minion. (5 turns left!)

Name: Uncompensated Upset
Text: Start at 1 Gold. Minions cost (1) but sell for (0). Upgrading the Tavern costs (2) less.

Name: Up-Prizing
Text: After you upgrade the Tavern, Discover a Tier 1 Darkmoon Prize. (Improves in 3 turns!)

Name: Valuation Inflation
Text: Tavern Tier 1 does not exist. Minions cost gold equal to their Tavern Tier.

Name: What Are the Odds?
Text: Only Tavern Tiers 1, 3, and 5 exist. Triple rewards Discover a minion of your Tier.

Name: Wisdom of Ulduar
Text: At the end of every 3 turns, set your right-most minion's stats to 15/15. (3 turns left!)
